attributes.action: provide better funding to schools and nurseries for SEND children
attributes.additional_details: children with additional needs require additional support to thrive. EHCPs are a necessary resource and further funding to support these children should be a basic right. a lack of this funding would lead to a severe lack of education and support within our new generation.
attributes.background: the government need to provide more funding toward EHCPs and the sen program. children rely on this support and need help to thrive. we need funding for these children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Increase funding for EHCPs to help address funding gaps in schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726705

Increase SEND funding for Early Years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713148

Increase funding for SEND in schools.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701409
